tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.5
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayALBEDO False isArrayFIELD False output_data_SOLARRAD $output_data_SOLARRAD name SAGA.climate_tools.5 ALBEDO $ALBEDO FIELD $FIELD YEAR $YEAR DLAT $DLAT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_SOLARRAD $OutputSection_SOLARRAD.outputType_SOLARRAD transmissionMode_SOLARRAD $OutputSection_SOLARRAD.transmissionMode_SOLARRAD

param.name: ALBEDO
param.label: Albedo
param.help: Albedo The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Field
param.help: Field The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_SOLARRAD
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SOLARRAD
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Orbital parameters used here are based on the work of Andre L. Berger and its implementation from the NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies (GISS). Berger's orbital parameters are considered to be valid for approximately 1 million years.
